# UIMenuElement

**Class**

An object representing a menu, action, or command.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class UIMenuElement
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuElement] defines the behavior shared by all menus, actions, and commands. You don’t create [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenuElement] objects directly. Instead, you create an appropriate object that inherits from this class, such as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIMenu], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAction], or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICommand].

## Getting the element attributes

- **title**: The title of the menu element.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle to display alongside the menu element’s title.
- **image**: The image to display alongside the menu element’s title.

## Creating a menu element

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a menu element from data in an unarchiver.

## Constants

- **UIMenuElement.Attributes**: Attributes that determine the style of the menu element.
- **UIMenuElement.State**: Constants that indicate the state of an action- or command-based menu element.
- **UIMenuElement.RepeatBehavior**: Possible repeat behaviors for a menu element.

## Menu elements and keyboard shortcuts

- **Adding menus and shortcuts to the menu bar and user interface**: Provide quick access to useful actions by adding menus and keyboard shortcuts to your Mac app built with Mac Catalyst.
- **Adopting menus and UIActions in your user interface**: Add menus to your user interface, with built-in button support and bar-button items, and create custom menu experiences.
- **UIAction**: A menu element that performs its action in a closure.
- **UICommand**: A menu element that performs its action in a selector.
- **UIKeyCommand**: An object that specifies a key press perform on a hardware keyboard and the resulting action.
- **UIDeferredMenuElement**: A placeholder menu element that the system replaces with the result of the block’s completion handler.
- **UIDeferredMenuElement.Provider**
- **UIMenuElement.Attributes**: Attributes that determine the style of the menu element.
- **UIMenuElement.State**: Constants that indicate the state of an action- or command-based menu element.
- **UIMenuLeaf**: An interface for an object that represents a menu element without child elements.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- UIAction
- UICommand
- UIDeferredMenuElement
- UIMenu

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- UIAccessibilityIdentification
